summary: This is an email from Linda Singer to an unspecified recipient regarding a call with the DOJ about the SDNY investigation into Jeffrey Epstein. The email is marked as confidential and attorney-client privileged, indicating legal discussions about the case.

persons.name: Linda Singer
persons.context: Sender of the email discussing a call with the DOJ regarding the SDNY Epstein investigation.

events.title: Call with DOJ re: Epstein SDNY Investigation
events.description: A call took place between Linda Singer and the DOJ regarding the Southern District of New York investigation into Jeffrey Epstein.

keyFacts: The email is dated October 2, 2020, indicating ongoing legal discussions about the Epstein case years after his death.
The communication is marked as confidential and attorney-client privileged, suggesting it contains sensitive legal strategy or information.
The subject references the SDNY investigation into Epstein, confirming continued DOJ interest in the case.
The email is part of the Epstein case document release, showing internal legal communications were obtained.
